butterfly.name: Monarch Butterfly
butterfly.description: The Monarch butterfly is known for its distinctive orange and black wings, with white spots along the edges. It is famous for its long-distance migration, covering thousands of miles from North America to Central Mexico during the winter.
butterfly.interesting_fact: Monarch butterflies go through four stages in their life cycle: egg, larva (caterpillar), pupa (chrysalis), and adult. They undergo a remarkable metamorphosis during this process.
